entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Whiteshell
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:37 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 18.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 26 in the evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Snow. Low minus 30. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 24. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 31. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. High minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. High minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 14.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023
